name: SinusCT
title: Sinus CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Sinus CT.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Sinus CT.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Sinus CT are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Sinus CT are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)
